item.title: Sweden plans to remove citizenship from people seen as threat to state
item.description: But it stops short of calls by the minority government for gangsters to have their citizenship revoked.

item.title: Germany to shoot down drones near military sites
item.description: The number of sightings has increased since Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, officials say.

item.title: Gaza 'humanitarian zone' struck almost 100 times since May, BBC Verify finds

item.title: Kenyan minister alleges intelligence agency behind his son's abduction
item.description: Justin Muturi says his son was freed following President William Ruto's intervention.
